Interface ClientComponentVisitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientLargeComponentPrinter, ClientSmallComponentPrinter, PlacedTileFactory
public interface ClientComponentVisitor
Visitor interface that allows any implementer to distinguish between the various subclasses of ClientComponent.
